@DebsExtra Thank you so much Debbie! Happy new year ðŸ˜Š
@tiiboi Victory for you and your household too bro. We shall multiply this new year!

I was also appointed the woman leader of my chapter. Talk about going from 0-100 real quick! I turned 30 in 2018 as well. I guess I'm just trying to say how grateful I am. I should have shared this testimony earlier but all the same, to God be the glory!!!!

I was like "Shy, behind the mic Ola" as P.R.O? Hmmmm. I prayed for this, I always wanted to be involved in politics, this won't be a bad start and that's how I campaigned, contested and won my election in 2018.

I joined a freight forwarding association in October 2017 since that (Freight forwarding) was also one of my hustles. Mr Emmanuel calls and says elections are coming up and they want me to contest as P.R.O....

By February, I wasn't praying for my goals, I was telling God that no matter what, I didn't want to be seen as a failure or a disappointment. On the 23rd of that month, my life changed. Mr Emmanuel called me...

I remember this time last year, I was so unsure of what my year would be like. I wrote goals like Pastor Sam said we should, one was to get a radio job so badly. ( I had even gone on air twice) Then they stopped picking my calls, I was so distraught!
